name: MATRIX
description: The surveillance state has just met its blind spot. This isn’t just finance, it’s defiance. The $MATRIX beta token is now live on Solana. Airdrop to $AINTI v2 holders has commenced. Each token is redeemable 1-1 for $MATRIX mainnet when launched. Privacy tools can be used freely in the ecosystem. Instead of a state-controlled digital currency, let's embracing decentralized solutions that empower individuals, not institutions, to guard our financial autonomy.
